items.sentence: I\'ve met the most wonderful girl in the world.
I\'ve never heard the kind of stories he tells.
I\'ve never lived in a French-speaking country.
I\'ve never mentioned it to anyone, except Tom.
I\'ve never seen a yellow submarine in my life.
The accident happened the day before yesterday.
The archaeologist found the entrance to a tomb.
The first thing you should do is call a lawyer.
The old man told the children an amusing story.
The recent advances in medicine are remarkable.
